Articles.Content: Ok, so I am trying to learn how to use RSS and RO. Wanted to get that off my chest. Now, I am starting to work on building the ISS using these. What is the best mechjeb launch parameters for ascent guidance to get to an Apoapsis of 400-416 km?
Mods, could you please move this to the Addon Affairs section (then delete THIS particular post?)

> 
> Ok, so I am trying to learn how to use RSS and RO. Wanted to get that off my chest. Now, I am starting to work on building the ISS using these. What is the best mechjeb launch parameters for ascent guidance to get to an Apoapsis of 400-416 km?

You might want to start a little smaller than a replica of Space Station! When I started using RO it took me like ten tries to put a little Sputnik-thing onto orbit. Anyway its been awhile since I used mechjeb for autopilot, but doesn't it let you set your desired orbit altitude?
It does, but it completely fails at doing it...around 110 Km, it goes into a complete nose-down orientation and I lose my apoapsis instead

I would suggest posting in the [Realism Overhaul discussion thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98033-Realism-Overhaul-Discussion-Thread?goto=newpost) for maximum exposure.

Also: [Here is a tutorial for using Mechjeb with RO](https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealismOverhaul/wiki/MechJeb-Ascents).

> 
> I would suggest posting in the [Realism Overhaul discussion thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98033-Realism-Overhaul-Discussion-Thread?goto=newpost) for maximum exposure.
> Also: [Here is a tutorial for using Mechjeb with RO](https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealismOverhaul/wiki/MechJeb-Ascents).

I actually did earlier but never got an answer until earlier today
